chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
si: sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
taifoi: terms_and_indices_from_one_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0)

Premises:
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input ->
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries <-> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
log_matching_hosts = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (nwState net h)) (log (nwState net h'))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (nwState net h))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig...
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
leaderLogs_entries_match_host_state_same : forall net net' : network, leaderLogs_entries_match_host net -> (forall h : Net.name, leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h)) = leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> (forall h : Net.name, log (snd (nwState net' h)) = log (snd (nwState net h))) -> leaderLogs_entries_match_host net'
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
leaderLogs_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) ll : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
update_elections_data_clientRequest_allEntries_new : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c))) -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst st))) \/ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd st))) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm (snd st) /\ type (snd st) = Leader
leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> t < currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_logs_sorted_host : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> sorted (log (snd (nwState net h)))
update_elections_data_appendEntries_log_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (h' : name) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log (snd st) /\ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = allEntries (fst st) \/ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = map (fun e : entry => (t, e)) es ++ allEntries (fst st) /\ (currentTerm...
leaderLogs_term_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry) (e : entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e log -> eTerm e < t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
leaderLogs_entries_match_nw = fun net : network => forall (h : Net.name) (llt : term) (ll : list entry) (p : packet) (t : term) (src : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In (llt, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t src pli plt es ci -> forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ll ->...-> Prop
update_elections_data_client_request_log_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c = (out, st', ms) -> allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c) = allEntries (fst st) /\ log st' = log (snd st) \/ type (snd st) = Leader /\ (exists e : entry, eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd st))) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm (snd st) /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type (snd st) = Leader /\...
update_elections_data_client_request_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c = (out, st', ms) -> allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c) = allEntries (fst st) \/ (exists e : entry, eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd st))) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm (snd st) /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type (snd st) = Leader /\ allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c) = (currentTerm...
update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (h' : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (te : term) (e : entry), handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t h' pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> In (te, e) (allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci)) -> In (te, e) (allEntries (fst st)) \/ In e (log st') \/ In e es /\ haveNewEntries (snd st) es = false /\ log st' = log (snd st)
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
handleAppendEntriesReply_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (h' : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (t' : term) (es' : list entry), handleAppendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci = (st', AppendEntriesReply t' es' true) -> t' = t /\ es' = es /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> In e (log st') \/ haveNewEntries st es = false /\ log st' = log st)
leaderLogs_entries_match_nw_packet_set : forall net net' : network, leaderLogs_entries_match_nw net -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> is_append_entries (pBody p) -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> (forall h : Net.name, leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h)) = leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> leaderLogs_entries_match_nw net'
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
leaderLogs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> sorted log : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> update_elections_data_input h inp (nwState net h) = gd -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
terms_and_indices_from_one_vwl = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name) (log : list entry), In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) -> terms_and_indices_from_one log : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_vwl {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
